title: For the first hour and a half, this thread will only be open to men
body:
After an hour and a half, everyone will be welcome.

See how wrong that sounds? You really messed up big time, Riot. What you did is disgusting and has no place here. If you hold a panel or event, it must be open to everyone.

The only case of advanced entry I can understand would be those with wheelchairs or other mobility aids, so that they can be allowed to be seated/sorted out more easily, or a special line where people paid specifically to get in first.

But based on gender? Sexual orientation? Hell no. HELL. NO.

What's the difference between a movie theater saying "whites only until 6:30. Blacks welcome after 6:30" and this garbage?

You just went back decades of progress.
Good job.
